caption.title: Climate variable selection.
caption.p: The CV mean logarithmic score, the DIC, and the likelihood ratio R LR 2 statistic for models including monthly and yearly random effects and an exposure–lag–response function with time lags from 0 to 5 months for individual climate variables: precipitation, SPI (1-month, 3-month, 6-month, and 12-month), Tmin, mean temperature, and maximum temperature. CV, cross-validated; DIC, deviance information criterion; SPI, Standardised Precipitation Index; Tmin, minimum temperature.
Click here for additional data file.
